name: The Burden (Chukees)
description: What you thought is perfect has it's own downsides that are not readily apparent. So you stick with it, enjoy in it, it becomes part of you.  The burden starts after realizing that not only it won't be on the rest of the road with you, but there are going to be nights where your struggle with it. You never know the value of a moment, until it becomes a memory. But some risks are worth taking.
